overview: Randy Adams is a serial entrepreneur who has founded seven venture-backed technology companies and has served as President of the Home Shopping Networkâ€™s Internet Division, Director of Engineering at Adobe Systems, Lead Designer at Steve Jobâ€™s NeXT computer company, Director at Yahoo, Inc. and Director and co-founder of FunnyOrDie.com. His accomplishments include the invention of PDF and Acrobat at Adobe Systems; the creation of the first ever e-commerce web site, the Internet Shopping Network and the creation of the first PC desktop publishing app, Personal Publisher. He holds a BS in Engineering from MIT.
